columns.apt_id: The unique identifier for the apartment.
columns.apt_booking_id: The unique identifier for the apartment booking.
columns.status_date: The date and time of the status record.
columns.available_yn: The availability status of the apartment.

View_Unit_Status.table_description: The table tracks the availability status of apartments over time.

columns.building_id: The unique identifier for the apartment building.
columns.building_short_name: The abbreviated name of the apartment building.
columns.building_full_name: The complete name of the apartment building.
columns.building_description: The description of the type of apartments offered.
columns.building_address: The full address of the apartment building.
columns.building_manager: The name of the manager responsible for the building.
columns.building_phone: The contact phone number for the building manager.

Apartment_Buildings.table_description: The table holds details about apartment buildings for rental.

columns.apt_id: The unique identifier for each apartment.
columns.building_id: The identifier for the building where the apartment is located.
columns.apt_type_code: The type classification of the apartment.
columns.apt_number: The specific number or designation of the apartment.
columns.bathroom_count: The total number of bathrooms in the apartment.
columns.bedroom_count: The total number of bedrooms in the apartment.
columns.room_count: The total number of rooms in the apartment.

Apartments.table_description: The table details the apartments available for rent.

columns.apt_id: The unique identifier for the associated apartment.
columns.facility_code: The code representing the facility available in the apartment.

Apartment_Facilities.table_description: The table lists facilities available for each apartment.

columns.guest_id: The unique identifier for each guest.
columns.gender_code: The gender of the guest, represented by a single character.
columns.guest_first_name: The first name of the guest.
columns.guest_last_name: The last name of the guest.
columns.date_of_birth: The birth date of the guest.

Guests.table_description: The table stores information about guests renting apartments.

columns.apt_booking_id: The unique identifier for each apartment booking.
columns.apt_id: The unique identifier for the associated apartment.
columns.guest_id: The unique identifier for the guest making the booking.
columns.booking_status_code: The status of the booking, such as confirmed or provisional.
columns.booking_start_date: The date when the apartment booking starts.
columns.booking_end_date: The date when the apartment booking ends.

Apartment_Bookings.table_description: The table maintains records of bookings made for apartments.
